6.7 Identifier reference

rop_mode

Datatype

datatype rop_mode =
      BLACKNESS |
      DSTINVERT |
      MERGECOPY |
      MERGEPAINT |
      NOTSRCCOPY |
      NOTSRCERASE |
      PATCOPY |
      PATINVERT |
      PATPAINT |
      SRCAND |
      SRCCOPY |
      SRCERASE |
      SRCINVERT |
      SRCPAINT |
      WHITENESS
